articles.description: The Newsreader is a new comedy-drama starring Sam Reid and Anna Torv as an unlikely partnership. Plus: Paul Hollywood visits the most dangerous cantina on Earth. Here’s what to watch this evening
articles.content:
The Newsreader
9pm, BBC Two
While theres no shortage of comedy-dramas navigating the chaos and toxicity of a newsroom, being set in 1980s Australia provides an interesting distinction here. More dr… [+2967 chars]

articles.title: Prince George snapped looking 'same height' as 'Gan gan' sends royal fans into frenzy - Express
articles.description: ROYAL FANS were left surprised after the Queen shared a picture of her great-grandson Prince George and the pair were the same height.

articles.author: Susana Polo
articles.title: Black Adam’s secret supervillain revealed to be Sabbac at SDCC 2022 - Polygon
articles.description: Dwayne “the Rock” Johnson takes the title role in Warner Bros. Black Adam, and took the Hall H stage at San Diego Comic Con 2022. Fans even got a sneaky little reveal of the movie’s so-far secret villain.
